definition: A designated path or route, typically found in mountainous regions, that involves the use of specialized equipment and techniques for climbing and traversing steep or rocky terrain. It is commonly used by outdoor enthusiasts and climbers seeking a thrilling and challenging experience while enjoying panoramic views of the surrounding landscape.
